sections.paragraph: நல்ல, நலமாயிருக்கிற, நன்மை, யோக்கியமான, சிறந்த - பெயரடை

ஆங்கில மூலம் / Original in English: Of uncertain affinity; properly beautiful, but chiefly (figuratively) good (literally or morally), that is, valuable or virtuous (for appearance or use, and thus distinguished from G18, which is properly intrinsic): - X better, fair, good (-ly), honest, meet, well, worthy.
